mapper.select: SELECT A.ATH_CD , A.ATH_CD_NM , A.ATH_CD_EXPL , A.ATH_DCD , A.APLY_YN , A.RGST_DT , A.RGST_TM , A.RGST_EMPNO , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.RGST_EMPNO ) AS RGST_EMPNM , A.DLT_YN , A.DLT_DT , A.DLT_TM , A.DLT_EMPNO , A.HND_DETL_DTM , A.HND_EMPNO , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.HND_EMPNO ) AS HND_EMPNM , A.HND_TMNL_NO , A.HND_TR_ID , A.GUID FROM IBIMS006B A WHERE 1=1 AND DLT_YN = '0'

SELECT rght_cd , rght_cd_nm , rght_cd_expl , rght_ccd , aplc_f , dlt_f , dlt_dt , dlt_tm , dlt_p_eno
FROM RAA94B A WHERE A.DLT_F != 'Y'
AND rght_cd_nm LIKE '%'|| #{rghtCdNm}||'%' OR rght_cd LIKE '%'|| #{rghtCdNm}||'%'

SELECT A.EMPNO /* 사원번호 */ , A.PWD /* 비밀번호 */ , A.EMP_NM /* 직원명 */ , A.DPRT_CD /* 부서코드 */ , A.DPRT_NM /* 부서명 */ , A.BD_CD /* 소속부점코드 */ , A.BD_NM /* 소속부점코드명 */ , A.ATH_CD /* 권한코드 */ , A.OPST_DCD /* 직책 */ FROM IBIMS003B A WHERE A.EMPNO = #{eno} /* TODO: 로그인 권한 부여기간 검증하는 로직 추가 필요 2023. 12. 21 KHJ */

SELECT EMPNO , EMP_NM , DPRT_CD , DPRT_NM , BD_CD , BD_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE 1=1
AND EMPNO LIKE '%'|| #{empno}|| '%'
AND EMP_NM LIKE '%'|| #{empNm}|| '%'
AND DPRT_CD LIKE '%'|| #{dprtCd}|| '%'
AND DPRT_NM LIKE '%'|| #{dprtNm}|| '%'
AND BD_CD LIKE '%'|| #{bdCd}|| '%'
AND BD_NM LIKE '%'|| #{bdNm}|| '%'

SELECT NVL(EMPNO, '') AS EMPNO , NVL(EMP_NM, '') AS EMP_NM , NVL((SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R030' AND CD_VL_ID = A.USR_DCD), '') AS USR_DCD_NM , NVL(ATH_CD, '') AS ATH_CD , NVL((SELECT ATH_CD_NM FROM IBIMS006B WHERE ATH_CD = A.ATH_CD), '') AS ATH_CD_NM , NVL(DPRT_CD, '') AS DPRT_CD , NVL(OSDT_DCD, '') AS OSDT_DCD , NVL(RGST_RSN, '') AS RGST_RSN , NVL(APLY_STRT_DT, '') AS APLY_STRT_DT , NVL(APLY_END_DT, '') AS APLY_END_DT , NVL(DEL_YN, '') AS DEL_YN , NVL((SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.DEL_EMPNO), '') AS DEL_EMP_NM , A.RGST_EMPNO , NVL((SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.RGST_EMPNO), '') AS RGST_EMP_NM , A.RGST_DT , A.HND_DETL_DTM , A.HND_EMPNO , NVL((SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.HND_EMPNO), '') AS HND_EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B A WHERE 1=1
AND A.ATH_CD = #{athCd}
AND (A.EMP_NM LIKE '%'|| #{empNm}|| '%') OR (A.EMPNO LIKE '%'|| #{empNm}|| '%')
AND A.DEL_YN ='N'
AND (A.DEL_YN = 'Y' OR A.DEL_YN ='N')
AND A.EMPNO = #{empno}
ORDER BY EMPNO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE IBIMS003B SET EMP_NM = #{empNm} , APLY_STRT_DT = #{aplyStrtDt} , APLY_END_DT = #{aplyEndDt} , RGST_RSN = #{rgstRsn} , ATH_CD = #{athCd} , HND_DETL_DTM = DEFAULT , HND_EMPNO = #{hndEmpno} WHERE 1 = 1 AND EMPNO = #{empno}
UPDATE IBIMS003B SET DEL_YN = #{delYn} , DEL_EMPNO = #{delEmpno} , HND_EMPNO = #{hndEmpno} , HND_DETL_DTM = DEFAULT WHERE 1 = 1 AND EMPNO = #{empno}
